TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectorySchedule extends System.Object

summary.span: 类表示 Active Directory 域服务复制的每周日程安排。

span.span: The class represents the weekly schedule for an Active Directory Domain Services replication.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool[,,] RawSchedule { get; set; }
.property instance bool[,,] RawSchedule
Public Property RawSchedule As Boolean(,,)
public: property cli::array <bool, 3> ^ RawSchedule { cli::array <bool, 3> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <bool, 3> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个三维数组，该数组指示一周中源可用于复制的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a three-dimensional array that indicates at what time during the week that the source is available for replication.

Docs.value:
一个 元素的三维数组，如果源在特定的 15 分钟间隔中可用于复制，那么数组中的元素为 。A three-dimensional array of elements in which the element is if the source is available for replication during that specific 15-minute interval. 如果源不可用于复制，元素为 。The element is if the source is not available for replication.
数组是在窗体 RawSchedule [<一天的一周>，<小时>， <15 分钟时间间隔内>]。The array is in the form RawSchedule[<day-of-week>, <hour>, <15-minute interval>]. 所有这些值都从零开始，星期从星期天早上 00:00（协调通用时间）开始。All of these values are zero-based and the week begins at 00:00 on Sunday morning, Coordinated Universal Time.
以下是有效的周日期值。The following are the valid values for the day-of-week.
一天的一周值 Day-of-week value
指示的日期是星期几。 Indicated day of the week.
0
0
Sunday Sunday
1
1
星期一 Monday
2
2
星期二 Tuesday
3
3
星期三 Wednesday
4
4
星期四 Thursday
5
5
星期五 Friday
6
6
星期六 Saturday
小时是从零开始并且以 24 小时形式指定的。The hour is zero-based and specified in 24-hour format. 例如，下午 2For example, 2 P.M. 将指定为 14。would be specified as 14. 有效值为 0 到 23。Valid values are 0-23.
15 分钟的时间间隔指定一小时内源可用于复制的 15 分钟的时间块。The 15-minute interval specifies the 15-minute block within the hour that the source is available for replication. 下表标识了 15 分钟时间间隔的可能值。The following table identifies the possible values for the 15-minute interval.
15 分钟的间隔 15-minute interval
描述 Description
0
0
源是可用于从 0 到 14 分钟在整点后的复制。 The source is available for replication from 0 to 14 minutes after the hour.
1
1
源是可用于从 15 到在整点后的 29 分钟内的复制。 The source is available for replication from 15 to 29 minutes after the hour.
2
2
源是可用于从 30 到 44 分钟在整点后的复制。 The source is available for replication from 30 to 44 minutes after the hour.
3
3
源是可用于从 45 到 59 分钟在整点后的复制。 The source is available for replication from 45 to 59 minutes after the hour.
下面的 C# 示例演示了如何使用此属性来确定源在星期二 15:50（协调通用时间）是否可用于复制。The following C# example shows how to use this property to determine if the source is available for replication at 15:50 Coordinated Universal Time on Tuesday.
```csharp Boolean isAvailable = scheduleObject.RawSchedule[2, 15, 3]; ```
下面的 C# 示例演示了如何使用此属性在运行时计算 15 分钟时间间隔（方法是将分钟数除以 15）。The following C# example shows how to use this property to calculate the 15-minute interval at runtime by dividing the minutes by 15.
```csharp Boolean isAvailable = scheduleObject.RawSchedule[2, 15, (Int32)50/15]; ```

summary.span: 将整个日程安排重置为不可用。

span.span: Resets the entire schedule to unavailable.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetDailySchedule (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.HourOfDay fromHour, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.MinuteOfHour fromMinute, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.HourOfDay toHour, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.MinuteOfHour toMinute);

.method public hidebysig instance void SetDailySchedule(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.HourOfDay fromHour, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.MinuteOfHour fromMinute, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.HourOfDay toHour, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.MinuteOfHour toMinute) cil managed
Public Sub SetDailySchedule (fromHour As HourOfDay, fromMinute As MinuteOfHour, toHour As HourOfDay, toMinute As MinuteOfHour)

public: void SetDailySchedule(System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::HourOfDay fromHour, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::MinuteOfHour fromMinute, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::HourOfDay toHour, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::MinuteOfHour toMinute);

param.name: fromHour
param.span: 成员之一，指定源可用于复制的第一个小时。

span.span: One of the members that specifies the first hour that the source will be available for replication.

param.name: fromMinute
param.span: 成员之一，指定源将可用于复制的第一个 15 分钟间隔。

span.span: One of the members that specifies the first 15-minute interval that the source will be available for replication.

param.name: toHour
param.span: 成员之一，指定源可用于复制的最后一个小时。

span.span: One of the members that specifies the final hour that the source will be available for replication.

param.name: toMinute
param.span: 成员之一，指定源将可用于复制的最后 15 分钟间隔。

span.span: One of the members that specifies the final 15-minute interval that the source will be available for replication.

summary.span: 将一周内每一天中的一定时间范围添加到日程安排中。

span.span: Adds a range of times for every day of the week to the schedule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有在此方法的参数都包含两端。All of the parameters in this method are inclusive. 此方法是累积的不会删除任何现有的计划信息。This method is cumulative and does not remove any existing schedule information. 如果现有计划和新的计划重叠，则仍将累积。If an existing schedule and the new schedule overlap, the result will still be cumulative. 若要清除计划，请使用方法。To clear the schedule, use the method.

summary.span: 将一个时间范围添加到日程安排中。

span.span: Adds a range of times to the schedule.

summary.span: 将一天中的一定时间范围添加到日程安排中。

span.span: Adds a range of times for a single day to the schedule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有在此方法的参数都包含两端。All of the parameters in this method are inclusive. 此方法是累积的不会删除任何现有的计划信息。This method is cumulative and does not remove any existing schedule information. 如果现有计划和新的计划重叠，则仍将累积。If an existing schedule and the new schedule overlap, the result will still be cumulative. 若要清除计划，请使用方法。To clear the schedule, use the method.

exception.span: 起始时间在结束时间之后。

span.span: The start time is after the end time.
One or more parameters is not valid.
